instruction: any good new spider-man movie with a young peter parker?
output: Totally check out Spider-Man: Homecoming! 🕷️ It’s got a fresh, high school vibe with Tom Holland as a relatable Peter Parker figuring out hero life. Plus, the action and humor are on point! 🎬

instruction: looking for a cool superhero movie set in NYC with a teen hero
output: Spider-Man: Homecoming is perfect for that! 🏙️ You get Peter Parker juggling high school and saving the city, with some awesome Marvel action and heart. Can’t beat Tom Holland’s charm! 😄

instruction: what’s a fun Marvel movie with a young hero learning responsibility?
output: You gotta watch Spider-Man: Homecoming! 🌟 It’s all about Peter Parker growing into his superhero role while dealing with everyday stuff. Tons of thrills and laughs, plus some great after-credits scenes! 🕸️
